name: Fish Curry (Malu Curry)
description: A tangy fish curry with goraka (garcinia) and coconut milk
ingredients: 500g fish (tuna or mackerel), cut into pieces
instructions: Marinate fish with turmeric and salt for 15 minutes
Soak goraka in water for 10 minutes
Heat oil and sauté onions, garlic, and ginger
Add curry powder and chili powder
Add goraka water and bring to boil
Add coconut milk and curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
Cook for 5 more minutes without stirring too much
cultural_notes: Goraka gives this curry its distinctive sour taste, popular in coastal regions Use fresh fish from coastal markets. Goraka (garcinia) is essential for authentic sour taste - never substitute with tamarind. The curry should have a deep red color from roasted spices.
description_sinhala: ගොරකා (ගාර්සීනියා) සහ පොල් කිරි සමග ඇඹුල් මාළු කරියක්
description_tamil: கோரக்கா (கார்சினியா) மற்றும் தேங்காய்ப்பால் கொண்ட கசப்பான மீன் குழம்பு
cultural_notes_sinhala: ගොරකා වෙරළබඩ ප්‍රදේශවල ජනප්‍රිය මෙම ව්‍යංජනයට එහි සුවිශේෂී ඇඹුල් රසය ලබා දෙයි
cultural_notes_tamil: கோரக்கா இந்த கறிக்கு அதன் தனித்துவமான புளிப்பு சுவை அளிக்கிறது, இது கடலோரப் பகுதிகளில் பிரபலமானது
